messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happiness, freedom and peace of mind
messages.msgSnippet: -=-Your words are usually very helpful to me so I tried to folllow this link but it didn t go anywhere, said blog not found. Just FYI. Cameron-=- Thanks.
messages.messageBody:
-=-Your words are usually very helpful to me so I tried to folllow
this link but it didn't go anywhere, said blog not found. Just FYI.
Cameron-=-

Thanks.

Sometimes a link won't light up (be active) because of the line
wrapping around or something.

In such cases, cut and paste the whole thing into the finder.
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2008/05/happiness- freedom-and- peace-
of-mind.html



It wrapped, the first time, and there were spaces inserted where
there shouldn't have been. I cut and pasted it, so I don't know how
the spaces got there, but maybe this one will work, and if not, try
the bare blog and go to 5/5 if it's not still at the top.



Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Your words are usually very helpful to me so I tried to folllow this link but it didn't go anywhere, said blog not found. Just FYI. Cameron


----- Original Message ----
From: Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...>
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, May 5, 2008 3:53:31 PM
Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happiness, freedom and peace of mind


-=-There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we
crave
most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always
attained by giving them to someone else. -General Peyton C. March
(1864-1955)- =-

Joyce, that's awesome.

I put it here

http://sandradodd. blogspot. com/2008/ 05/happiness- freedom-and- peace-of-
mind.html

with links to unschooling writings about the general idea.

Sandra

messages.subject: Happiness, freedom and peace of mind
messages.msgSnippet: Here s a quote that came through the Word a Day email: There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness,
messages.messageBody:
Here's a quote that came through the Word a Day email:

There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we
crave
most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always
attained by giving them to someone else. -General Peyton C. March
(1864-1955)

Joyce
